src:
Titik Balik Karier Unai Emery, Segera Dipecat Arsenal?
04 Nov 2019, 09:00 by Bola.net
Bola.net - Unai Emery disebut sudah mencapai titik balik dalam kariernya sebagai pelatih Arsenal. Kabarnya, posisi Emery sekarang sudah tidak terlalu aman. Rumor pemecatan tidak bisa diremehkan.
Saat ini, Arsenal hanya bisa meraih 11 poin dari 9 pertandingan terakhir, tersingkir dari Carabao Cup, dan gagal memetik dua kemenangan kandang atas Crystal Palace dan Wolverhampton.
Teriakan frustrasi fans Arsenal tak lagi terbendung. Mereka heran sekaligus kecewa dengan beberapa keputusan kontroversial Emery. Akibatnya, posisi Emery semakin terancam.
Mungkinkah Emery sudah kehabisan waktu? Baca selengkapnya di bawah ini ya, Bolaneters!
text:
The Turning Point of Unai Emery's Career, Will Arsenal Soon be Fired?
Nov 04 2019, 09:00 by Bola.net
Bola.net - Unai Emery is said to have reached a turning point in his career as Arsenal coach. Reportedly, Emery's position is now not very safe. The dismissal rumors cannot be underestimated.
Currently, Arsenal can only win 11 points from the last 9 matches, knocked out of the Carabao Cup, and failed to pick two home wins over Crystal Palace and Wolverhampton.
Shouts of frustration from Arsenal fans were no longer unstoppable. They were both surprised and disappointed by Emery's controversial decisions. As a result, Emery's position is increasingly threatened.
Could Emery have run out of time? Read below, Bolaneters!
